Revelations: Surveillance of G20 delegates in London
Target(s): South African delegates, Russian delegates, Turkish finance minister and other delegates
Why?: To influence discussions to the UK's advantage

Revelations: EU and UN buildings bugged by the NSA
Countries: EU, Brazil, Bulgaria, Colombia, France, Georgia, Greece, India, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Slovakia, South Africa, South Korea, Taiwan, Venezuela, Vietnam, Gabon, Uganda, Nigeria, Bosnia, China, Russia, Iran, North Korea
Target(s): UN Secretary General, EU Diplomats, Governments
Why?: To gain access to “foreign government and economic” data which would give the U.S the upper hand in negotiations

Revelations: NSA intelligence on the UN Security Council
Countries: France, Japan, Mexico, Brazil, Iran, Turkey, Lebanon, Global
Target(s): UN Security Council members (representatives of countries)
Why?: To ensure that the Security Council voted for increased sanctions against Iran

Revelations: NSA supplied intelligence on the Summit of Americas
Countries: Antigua and Barbuda, Argentina, Bahamas, Belize, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Grenada, Guatemala, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Jamaica, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama, Peru, Paraguay, Peru, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, Uruguay, Venezuela
Why?: To deal with issues, such as Cuba, and “difficult counterparts”, such as the Venezuelan President

Revelations: NSA targets French foreign ministry network
Why?: Foreign policy objectives, weapons trade and economic stability

Revelations: NSA targets Brazilian and Mexican presidents
Type of surveillance: Filtering data and mapping contact network
Why?: Brazil and Mexico are rising as new actors which can stress regional stability

Revelations: GCHQ exploits Belgian telecom company
Target(s): European Commission, European Parliament and the European Council (and Belgacom employees)
Type of surveillance: Redirection to websites that plant Regin malware on targets' computers
Why?: To gain access to and infiltrate communications in the European Council, European Parliament and European Council

Revelations: India a top target
Target(s): Indian diplomats at the UN and DC offices

Revelations: US and Canada spy on Brazil's Ministry of Mines and Energy
Target(s): Brazil's Ministry of Mines and Energy (MME)

Revelations: Mexican president's email account accessed
Type of surveillance: Computer-network exploitation and access to President's public email account
Why?: To gain insight into Mexico's political system and internal stability

Revelations: Wiretapping French diplomats
Countries: France, Brazil, Bulgaria, Colombia, Georgia, Greece, India, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Slovakia, South Africa, South Korea, Taiwan, Venezuela, Vietnam
Type of surveillance: Data collection from implants, computer screens, magnetic emanations and LAN implants

Revelations: NSA monitors calls of world leaders
French intelligence questioned NSA over hacking incident
Type of surveillance: Cyber attacks against the French presidential network

Revelations: US spies from the Berlin Embassy, targets Angela Merkel
Type of surveillance: Phone monitoring, interception of cellular signals, wireless networks and satellite communications
Why?: Intelligence gathering with regards to the trans-Atlantic free trade agreement

Revelations: Venezuela named as a key NSA target
Target(s): Venezuelan Government and Ministry of Planning and Finance

Revelations: GCHQ monitors international hotel reservations
Type of surveillance: Interception of mobile, internet and fax communications

Revelations: Indonesian leadership an ASD target
Target(s): Indonesian President and nine other officials and confidants

Revelations: Canada allowed NSA to spy on G8 and G20 Summits
Why?: To influence discussions to the U.S.' advantage

Revelations: Sweden's FRA spies on Russian leadership for the NSA
Countries: Russia, the Baltic and the Middle East

Revelations: Italian leadership, embassy and public targeted by the NSA
Type of surveillance: Gaining access to communications by means of “implants” and obtaining images from hard drives

Revelations: NGOs and allies found on GCHQ target lists
Countries: EU, Germany, Israel, Africa, France, Switzerland, Georgia, Turkey
Type of surveillance: Phone monitoring, email monitoring, satellite surveillance

Revelations: NSA spied to strengthen US negotiating position at UN climate conference
Why?: To strengthen US negotiating position at the 2009 Copenhagen Climate Summit

Revelations: German Chancellors have been surveilled by US since at least 2002
2013 FISA Court order authorised spying on communications related to “Germany”
Countries: Germany, China, Japan, Mexico, Venezuela, Yemen, Brazil, Sudan, Guatemala, Bosnia, Russia
Target(s): German Defense Ministry and Chancellor, and 122 other international leaders

Revelations: GCHQ focuses on international climate summits
Regin malware linked to GCHQ attack on another EU country
Target(s): European Commission, European Parliament and the European Council
Type of surveillance: Redirection to websites that plant Regin malware on targets' computers
Why?: To gain access to and infiltrate communications in the European Council, European Parliament and European Council

Revelations: New Zealand targeted Solomon islands public officials and anti-corruption campaigners
Target(s): Solomon Islands: Permanent Secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and External Trade; Chief of staff to the Prime Minister; Special Secretary to the Prime Minister; Senior Foreign Affairs official; Cabinet Secretary
Why?: Possibly part of a secret attempt to intercept information about the Truth and Reconciliation Commission

Revelations: New Zealand's spies plotted China hack with the NSA
Target(s): Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Chinese consulate and visa office in Auckland
Type of surveillance: Attempted hack of data communications link
